query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fixtures) as fixtures_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teams) as teams_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leagues) as leagues_count;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 19iLEYK5xVcJkRu.root --database iPoAWkYDjVf6EgjC7ZwEhi --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fixtures) as fixtures_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teams) as teams_count,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leagues) as leagues_count;
